original_text: And Joshua said, “Alas, Sovereign Lord, why did you ever bring this people across the Jordan to deliver us into the hands of the Amorites to destroy us? If only we had been content to stay on the other side of the Jordan!
korean_text: 이르되 슬프도소이다 주 여호와여 어찌하여 이 백성을 인도하여 요단을 건너게 하시고 우리를 아모리 사람의 손에 넘겨 멸망시키려 하셨나이까 우리가 요단 저쪽을 만족하게 여겨 거주하였더면 좋을 뻔하였나이다

sentences.original_text: why did you ever bring this people across the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 이 백성을 요단 강 건너로 인도하셨나이까

sentences.original_text: to deliver us into the hands of the Amorites
If only we had been content
to stay on the other side of the Jordan
